smoke.name: fixture-repo-strict-pass
command:
set -euo pipefail
repo="${AGENTS_HOME:?}"
work_rel="out/tests/script-smoke/fixtures/audit-progress-addendum/repo"
work="$repo/$work_rel"
rm -rf "$work"
mkdir -p "$work"
cd "$work"

git init -q -b main
git config user.email fixture@example.com
git config user.name "Fixture User"

mkdir -p docs/progress/archived
cat >docs/progress/archived/20260101_fixture.md <<'MD'
# codex-kit: Fixture progress

| Status | Created | Updated |
| --- | --- | --- |
| DONE | 2026-01-01 | 2026-01-10 |

Links:

- PR: TBD
- Docs: None
- Glossary: TBD

## Addendum

### 2026-01-10

- Change: Fixture
- Reason: Fixture
- Impact: Fixture
- Links: Progress: 20260114_followup.md

## Goal

- Fixture
MD

git add -A
git commit -m "init" -q

"$repo/skills/workflows/pr/progress/progress-addendum/scripts/audit_progress_addendum.sh" \
  --require-addendum \
  --check-updated \
  --require-links \
  --require-progress-link
